title: Welcome to Split Lease
description: Commuting or Traveling? Rent a home by nights-of-the-week or weeks of the month. Live in multiple cities or skip your commute. Pay for the space, not cleaning fees and taxes. Have a space to share? Make predictable income by hosting repeat guests.
page_text:
Ongoing Rentals for Repeat Stays
Select which days you'd like to stay in NYC and only pay for the nights you need.
S M T W T F S
Explore Rentals
Only pay for nights you need
100s of Split Leases, or source off market
Financially optimal. 45% less than Airbnb
Safely store items while you're away.
Same room, same bed. Unlike a hotel.
Stop playing room roulette!
Choose Your Split Schedule
Explore weekend listings
Explore weeks of the month
Explore weeknight listings
Choose when to be a local
Fully-furnished spaces ensure move-in is a breeze.

Forget HOAs. Switch neighborhoods seasonally, discover amazing flexibility.
